name: Granny's Comp
body: Hey guys my grandma's computer won't attach to her wifi netty baby! She calls me almost everyday to complain about it, and I just can't take it anymore.

name: Making a GitHub
body: Hey guys, I don't know what I'm doing! Trying to make a new 'github' because all my friends said I should. HELP ME!

name: Taylor Swift
body: For some reason, ONLY my taylor swift music won't upload to my comp... I'm trying so hard to get it to work but it just won't. Any leads?
